title: [代朋友出] 佢外國人無account, 佢真心打

replies.msg:
[代朋友出] 佢外國人無account, 佢真心打
有無巴打幫手翻譯下？

Hi everyone, I just want to give a suggestion.
Things are escalating fast and divisions are increasing. Escalation is what the HK govt wants, to weaken overall support for the movement. Also, foreign leaders don’t like vandalism since they don’t want their own citizens to think that it is acceptable (no matter the reason); we shouldn’t lose their support. The situation now also makes it really easy for dirty police to vandalise and frame protests for it.
Instead of going into this trap, we should increase pressure on the HK govt. Let’s give any de-escalation as a an ‘olive branch’ (with the 5 demands) and let the World know, so the govt will be in the hot spot. If they just repeat the same usual shit it’ll look really bad for them, but we will remind others that we are organised and peaceful if we had the choice.
Let’s also take time to think things over and decide what to do next. At this point, it’s more important than ever to unite. We all have a stake here and we are stronger together.
Lastly, we should take the this time to remember those who are missing or already left us. This needs much more attention but it’s being overshadowed by the news of conflicts. The World needs to know, it’s the only way to bring any justice (as police won’t investigate).
You guys are very bright, but don’t let anger take over.

公民抗爭式交稅

香港人真 · 反抗！！！

入黎跟住做啦！！！

＞【https://lih.kg/1637669】＜
